column1: Hildor was one of the many names among the Elves for the race of Men

column2: and contains an influence from the Sundocarme KHILI ("follow"). In the The Etymologies
column3: and in the manuscript Parma Eldalamberon 17
column4: appears the Quenya form hildi ("followers = mortal men"; "after-comers")
column5: derived from the Sundocarme KHILI#Other versions.

column1: Helge Fauskanger has suggested that the unattested singular form of plural Hildor should be Hildo.Helge Fauskanger
column2: "http://folk.uib.no/hnohf/quen-eng.htm Quettaparma Quenyallo" at http://folk.uib.no/hnohf/ Ardalambion (accessed 16 June 2011)
